report_date as reportDate, a.dept_id as deptId,b.simple_name as deptName, channel_no as channelNo, order_num as orderNum, order_amount as orderAmount, order_dept_amount as orderDeptAmount, order_cost_amount as orderCostAmount, cash_num as cashNum, cash_amount as cashAmount, cash_dept_amount as cashDeptAmount, cash_cost_amount as cashCostAmount, a.create_time as createTime
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_dept_order_report SELECT date_sub(curdate(), INTERVAL 1 DAY) AS reportDate,a.dept_id,a.channelNo, a.orderNum,a.orderAmount,a.orderDeptAmount,a.orderCostAmount,b.cashNum, b.cashAmount,b.cashDeptAmount,b.cashCostAmount,now() FROM ( SELECT dept_id,(case when channel_no = '101553668' then '101713675' else channel_no end) as channelNo, count(*) AS orderNum, sum(order_amount) AS orderAmount, sum(dept_amount) AS orderDeptAmount, sum(cost_amount) AS orderCostAmount FROM t_pay_order WHERE order_time >= CONCAT(date_sub(curdate(), INTERVAL 1 DAY),' 00:00:00') AND order_time <= CONCAT(date_sub(curdate(), INTERVAL 1 DAY),' 23:59:59') AND order_status = '2' GROUP BY dept_id ) a LEFT JOIN ( SELECT dept_id,count(*) AS cashNum, sum(cash_amount) AS cashAmount, sum(dept_amount) AS cashDeptAmount, sum(cost_amount) AS cashCostAmount FROM t_mch_cash_flow WHERE create_time >= CONCAT(date_sub(curdate(), INTERVAL 1 DAY),' 00:00:00') AND create_time <= CONCAT(date_sub(curdate(), INTERVAL 1 DAY),' 23:59:59') AND cash_status = '2' GROUP BY dept_id ) b ON a.dept_id = b.dept_id
